show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #68 Frank Wooten "Future Fencing"
subtitle: #68 Frank Wooten "Future Fencing"
summary:
Have you ever wondered about Virtual Fence? Frank Wooten from Vence.io joins us to talk about the technology he has developed, where it's being implemented and what kind of benefits it could have for us ranchers
